history.proof: intros x. hauto use: @plus_zero_l, @plus_reg_r, Ring.ax4, @opp_zero, @plus_opp_l unfold: Ring.base, Ring.AbelianGroup, Ring.sort, AbelianGroup.sort, mult.

original: intros x. rewrite <- mult_zero_r. rewrite <- Ring.ax4. rewrite plus_opp_r. rewrite AnabelianGroup.ax4. rewrite plus_zero_l. reflexivity.
